talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Norfe$
That would be difficult, {user_nick}. Even now, the Aergal refugees are still pouring in,
and it would be next to impossible to move this many people to Merca's Heart all at once without being noticed. There are also the wounded to consider.

$Norfe$
I am also well aware that even though Hiver hasn't made any significant moves against Rhadames yet,
that won't always be the case.
Rhadames has its own countermeasures in place for that very reason, so there's no need for you to worry.

${user_nick}$
That's good to hear, but…

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9919_sp_01.ogg}
It'll be okay. I really don't like the idea of fighting my sister, but...
I'll stop anyone who tries to bring down Rhadames.

$Honest Merchant Pero$
…………..

$Sorceress Anna$
………….

$Injured Refugee$
……………

$Suffering Refugee$
……………..

$Norfe$
Did Arc tell you anything else?

${user_nick}$
Oh, that's right! (Talks about the whereabouts of the Ancient Book and Cup Lid that Arc mentioned.)

$Norfe$
The princess, you say…
In that case, citizens of Aergal Kingdom might know something about the Cup of Healing Lid.
For now, it would be wise to ask around among the refugees.

$Norfe$
You might find a clue about the princess as well.
It would be best be if the princess made it to Rhadames...
I will ask the guards to keep an eye out for her.

$Norfe$
But more importantly, there's something I need you to do, {user_nick}…

${user_nick}$
Huh? What is it?

$Norfe$
Can you go meet Honest Merchant Pero in Merca's Heart for me?
Apparently the supplies delivered last time are more or less ready.

$Norfe$
And while you're there, can you procure some Full Moon Herb as well?
It is a herb that Anna says she needs urgently.

${user_nick}$
Sure, it's the least I can do.

$Full Moon Herb$
…………………………………

$Norfe$
Thank you. You can deliver the item to Sorceress Anna after procuring it.

※ Go to Honest Merchant Pero in Merca's Heart.

$Honest Merchant Pero$
Well, if it isn't {user_nick}. What brings you here?

${user_nick}$
Norfe of Rhadames sent me. Apparently there are some supplies for delivery…

$Honest Merchant Pero$
Ah, you came from Rhadames. Wait a moment.

$Honest Merchant Pero$
I tried to get everything that was included on the list, but…

$Honest Merchant Pero$
With the destruction of Aergal Kingdom, the largest commercial base in the West,
even us Honest Merchants have been hit hard financially.
I had trouble procuring everything that was asked for as a result.

$Honest Merchant Pero$
This is the best I could do for supplies at the moment. (Hands over a large bundle.)
The remainder of the goods could take some time. Can you tell Norfe that?

${user_nick}$
Sure, will do. Oh, and… Do you have some Full Moon Herb, by any chance? Apparently it's urgent…

$Honest Merchant Pero$
Full Moon Herb? Unfortunately even I am having trouble finding that these days.
The spawning season for the jellyfish living in the caves has begun, so we can't get close.
We also ran out of the stock already procured.

${user_nick}$
(That's not good. Anna said it was urgently needed...)

$Honest Merchant Pero$
Well... I could tell you the location where Full Moon Herb grows,
and, if you want, you could go get some yourself.
If you do, I'll refine it so you can use it as a medicinal herb.
It's dangerous there during spawning season, but I feel comfortable telling you. I think you'll be fine, {user_nick}.

${user_nick}$
Where can I find it?

$Honest Merchant Pero$
The Full Moon Herb grows in the Secret Seabed Cave on Chiron Island.
It's a flower that shines with a yellow light akin to the full moon, so it isn't hard to find.

$Honest Merchant Pero$
Please be careful on your journey.

※ Full Moon Herb can be found in the Secret Seabed Cave on Chiron Island.

$Full Moon Herb$
(The flower shines with a yellow light.)

$Honest Merchant Pero$
You already found some? You never cease to amaze me, {user_nick}.
If you give it to me, I'll separate out the parts that can be used as a medicinal herb.

$Honest Merchant Pero$
(Trims the roots and stems of the Full Moon Herb, picks out the damaged leaves, separates them,
and puts everything except the stems in a pouch.) Here you go. You can use the leaves to treat wounds,
the roots for fever, and the petals as a supplement to boost your energy.

${user_nick}$
Thanks! (I can just bring this to Anna now, right?)

$Honest Merchant Pero$
The situation is tense in the Western Territory at the moment,
so I will be praying for Rhadames's safety. Please deliver these goods to Norfe.
※ Find Sorceress Anna in Rhadames.

$Sorceress Anna$
{user_nick}? What is it now?
We've already done everything we can for the refugees, so there's nothing else you can do to help.

${user_nick}$
Is that so...? Here, Norfe told me to bring this to you.
(Hands over the prepared Full Moon Herb.)

$Sorceress Anna$
Oh... This is Full Moon Herb, isn't it? This is the herb I requested from Norfe! Thank you for bringing me this! This will make up for the medicine I've been lacking.

${user_nick}$
(Now that I've helped Anna, I can ask around among the refugees about the Cup of Healing, right?)
Is there anything else I can do to help?

$Sorceress Anna$
(Grinding the leaves and beginning to decoct the herbs.) Huh? Something to help? Well...I'd say giving this medicine to the injured would be the biggest help.

$Sorceress Anna$
(Hands over the finished medicine.) Here you go, Anna's trademark "blink-of-an-eye" medicine!

${user_nick}$
"Blink-of-an-eye" medicine…?

$Sorceress Anna$
Hehe, that's right. Use this ointment and your wounds will be healed in the blink-of-an-eye, hence the name.
Just apply this to the wounds of the patients.

$Sorceress Anna$
Cover the wounds with it and they will be completely healed!

$Suffering Refugee$
Groan…. Owww….. (Grabs ankle in agony.)

${user_nick}$
Are you okay? It will help if you apply this ointment. (Applies blink-of-an-eye medicine to ankle wound.)

$Suffering Refugee$
Phew... This medicine... It's really amazing. Thank you so much, really. I don't know what to say... If it weren't for Rhadames...

${user_nick}$
We're just helping people in need!

${user_nick}$
But… Can I ask you something??

$Suffering Refugee$
Sure, ask me anything. I'll tell you anything, except our family's secret technique, of course.

${user_nick}$
It's nothing major, I just wondering if you knew anything about the Cup of Healing?

$Suffering Refugee$
Cup of Healing? Is that some kind of tea cup?

${user_nick}$
No, it's... It's the lid of the cup to be exact. I heard there was something written about it in an ancient book of Aergal.

$Suffering Refugee$
I guess if it was worth recording in the library records, it must have been an old item indeed.
I never really spent any time in the library though, so...

${user_nick}$
I see… (Then maybe I should ask about that Princess Sylvania mentioned by Arc.)
Then, do you happen to know anything about Princess Sylvania?

$Suffering Refugee$
Well, is there anyone who doesn't know about Princess Sylvania of Aergal Kingdom??
Our kingdom is protected by the Grand Duke, and Princess Sylvania is his only heir.
Although she would rather travel around the world than focus on the affairs of the realm.

$Suffering Refugee$
With that in mind, it seems I heard that the princess was outside the kingdom when the attack occurred...
It's a relief to know that she escaped the disaster.

${user_nick}$
(The refugee seems genuinely concerned about the princess...
What matters is that it seems she wasn't in Aergal Kingdom when the attack happened.
But in that case, where is she now?)

${user_nick}$
Thank you for the information. (I should ask another refugee now.)

$Injured Refugee$
(Holding side as if with a hurt back.)

${user_nick}$
Oh my, are you okay? How did you get hurt like this?

$Injured Refugee${sound:npc_Refugee4_qu9920_sp_01.ogg}
Well… I was attacked by bandits while escaping the Red Waste… I was trying to protect my books and.…

${user_nick}$
Oh? (Books?) Is there anything else bothering you? It'll help if you apply this right away.
(Hands over blink-of-an-eye medicine.) If you rub it on your side, it'll get better soon.

$Injured Refugee$
Is that all I needed? What would have happened if I hadn't arrived at Rhadames on time...?
Thank you! I'll never forget your kindness!

${user_nick}$
It wasn't much... Hey, do you know happen to know anything about the Cup of Healing, by any chance?

$Injured Refugee$
Did you say... Cup of Healing?
I know it's a relic of legend or some kind of material of value in records
because I work as a transcriber of books. If you're looking for the real thing....

$Injured Refugee$
I wonder if it might be in the castle. Or perhaps the library.
Many items of value are on display there.
Though I suppose it's probably buried beneath a pile of rubble now…

${user_nick}$
It, it can't be…
(So we'll never find the Cup of Healing Lid? That, or we'll have to excavate it from the rubble…)
Then… is it possible Princess Sylvania might know about it?

$Injured Refugee${sound:npc_Refugee4_qu9920_sp_02.ogg}
Princess Sylvania? She most certainly would know.
On the way to Rhadames after the fall of the Aergal Kingdom, I saw the princess's handmaid...
I doubt she was going back to Aergal.

$Injured Refugee$
I hope she wasn't injured…

${user_nick}$
(Then, does that mean there is a chance Princess Sylvania traveled from Aergal Kingdom to Rhadames?
For now, the best thing would be to consult with Norfe.)
※ Go to Norfe in Rhadames.

$Norfe$
There you are, {user_nick}.
I heard from Anna that you distributed the medicine among the refugees. Thank you.

${user_nick}$
Don't mention it, I couldn't not help. By the way, Pero said more time was needed to prepare the remaining supplies.

$Norfe$
I see. The Honest Merchants are also suffering from the collapse of Aergal Kingdom.
But I'm glad they said they're willing to help.

$Norfe$
It seems the issue of the refugees is sorting itself out, but there is still the matter of the Cup of Healing...

$Norfe$
I asked around among the refugees about the Cup of Healing Lid,
but couldn't find anyone who knew much of substance.

${user_nick}$
I asked around too... One refugee said it might be in the Aergal library or castle,
but that it must have been buried in the collapse… Don't tell me we'll never find it after all we've done?!

$Norfe$
If it was buried in the desert, it would be hard to find... But there must be a way.
Besides, it's not clear yet that it was buried.

${user_nick}$
Right? Oh, I almost forgot. I asked about Princess Sylvania too, and it seems that when Aergal Kingdom
collapsed she was traveling abroad. But they also reported seeing her on the way here, so….
Maybe the princess was on her way to Rhadames, too?

$Norfe$
What you say seems reasonable, {user_nick}. If she returned and saw the state of Aergal,
she would have come to Rhadames seeking her people…

${user_nick}$
But how is it possible that the sole heir to the throne was able to cavort outside the kingdom?
Is it because she was not the king?(Cassius said the knights followed him everywhere whenever he left the kingdom...)

$Norfe$
It must have been a characteristic unique to the Aergal Kingdom.
It may have been more possible due to the excellent health of the Grand Duke
prior to the fall of the kingdom.

$Norfe$
So maybe she'll soon arrive in Rhadames, what with all the refugees pour-...
(Suddenly stops talking.)

${user_nick}$
Norfe?
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Windy Hill
journal.contents:
According to Arc, Hiver is the prime suspect in the destruction of Aergal Kingdom. You can't believe Hiver has already become a power player in the West. What's going to happen to Rhadames? Talk to Norfe about Rhadames' survival.

Rhadames - Norfe

journal.title: Flower Blooming Beneath the Moon Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Norfe doesn't seem to be particularly worried in spite of concerns about Rhadames's security. Rather, he wants you to meet with Honest Merchant Pero at Merca's Heart to get supplies for the refugees. Does he have something specific in mind? Go meet with Honest Merchant Pero for now.

Merca's Heart - Honest Merchant Pero

journal.title: Flower Blooming Beneath the Moon Ⅱ
journal.contents:
Pero says that they are out of Full Moon Herbs, one of the items on the supply list, and asked for your help to procure it instead. Go to the Secret Seabed Cave on Chiron Island and get some Full Moon Herbs.

Merca's Heart (Chiron Island) - Secret Seabed Cave
journal.destination: Gather Full Moon Herbs in the Secret Seabed Cave

journal.title: Flower Blooming Beneath the Moon Ⅲ
journal.contents:
You successfully procured five Full Moon Herbs. Now go see Honest Merchant Pero and get the items on the supply list.

Merca's Heart - Honest Merchant Pero

journal.title: Panacea
journal.contents:
You got the items on the list from Honest Merchant Pero. Take the items and go to Sorceress Anna. She might have something for you to do to help out.

Rhadames - Sorceress Anna
journal.destination: Deliver the Full Moon Herbs to Sorceress Anna
journal.todo_msg: Deliver the items to Sorceress Anna.

journal.title: Researching the Cup of Healing Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Anna made some medicine using the supplies you brought. She wants you to apply this cream on the refugees… While treating the Aergal Kingdom refugees, ask them about the Cup of Healing.

Rhadames - Suffering Refugee

journal.title: Researching the Cup of Healing Ⅱ
journal.contents:
Anna made some medicine using the supplies you brought. Anna wants you to apply this cream on the refugees… While treating the Aergal Kingdom refugees, ask them about the Cup of Healing.

Rhadames - Injured Refugee

journal.title: Unstable Supports
journal.contents:
You asked some refugees about the Cup of Healing, but learned little of substance. Is this where the mission hits a snag? Before coming to any conclusions, tell Norfe what happened.

Rhadames - Norfe
